instructions:
Brown ground beef and pour off excess fat. Chop celery, onion and green pepper very fine. Sauté the
chopped vegetables with bacon drippings in a 4-quart saucepan for about 7 minutes. Add all remaining
ingredients and bring to a boil. Cover and simmer 1 hour. Taste for additional chili powder. Makes 5 1/2
cups. 
*(Rev. *(7/2/98)*
ingredients: 1/2 tsp chili powder, or to taste
name: Mexi-hot Sauce
creator: Melissa Stark
